enhanced_by.reason: The setCurrentLocale method relies on the normalizeLocale method to ensure the locale is properly normalized before setting it.
The setCurrentLocale method updates the locale chain if the locale is not already present in the LOCALE_2_LOCALES_CHAIN map.
The getLocale method retrieves the current locale, which can be used to verify that setCurrentLocale has correctly updated the locale.
The getLocaleChain method retrieves the locale chain, which can be used to verify that setCurrentLocale has correctly updated the locale chain.
